FAQ

Vortex Gateway compatibilities

  1. Which Operating System are supported by Vortex Gateway ?
  2. Does Vortex Gateway supports Apache Maven 2 ?
  3. Does Vortex Gateway also work with Vortex OpenSplice v6.1 ?
  4. How can I import my Vortex Gateway project in Eclipse ?
  5. I imported my Maven/Gateway project in Eclipse, but the DDS types code generated from my IDL files is not imported in my project.

Vortex Gateway compatibilities

Which Operating System are supported by Vortex Gateway ?

Any OS supporting Java 6 and Vortex OpenSplice.

[top]

Does Vortex Gateway supports Apache Maven 2 ?

We strongly advice to use Apache Maven 3 because of an known issue with Apache Maven 2 on Windows platforms.

[top]

Does Vortex Gateway also work with Vortex OpenSplice v6.1 ?

Yes.

[top]

How can I import my Vortex Gateway project in Eclipse ?

If your Eclipse installation doesn't already have m2e plugin installed, install it from http://www.eclipse.org/m2e/ .

[top]

I imported my Maven/Gateway project in Eclipse, but the DDS types code generated from my IDL files is not imported in my project.

This is a known issue with m2e plugin. You have to add yourself the target/generated-sources/idl directory as source folder of your Eclipse project.

[top]
